name: SLComposed
summary: SLComposed provides a simpler API for creating and presenting SLComposeViewControllers.
description: To make use of SLComposed, simply call `composePost(text: String?, image: UIImage?, url: NSURL?, network: SLComposedServiceType)` from any UIViewController. This will create, populate and return a `SLComposeViewController` if the user has the ability to post to that network, otherwise, it will return an `UIAlertController`.
